SEARCH
Module pimperium
Package pimperium.models

Class Game

java.lang.Object
pimperium.models.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Runnable
public class Game extends Object implements Runnable, Serializable
The model in the VCM design pattern, performing all the game logic
See Also:

      Check the validity of an Explore move tried by a player
      Parameters:
      move - The move tried by the player, stored as a list of ships assigned to a list of destinations
      Returns:
      The validity of the move as a boolean

      Parameters:
      move - The move tried by the player, stored as a list of ships assigned to a hexagon
      player - The player performing the move
      Returns:
      The validity of the move as a boolean
